name: @cellajs/cella
description: Cella is a TypeScript template to create powerful web apps with sync and offline capabilities.
author: CellaJS <info@cellajs.com>

scripts.generate:openapi: pnpm --filter backend generate-openapi && pnpm --filter frontend generate-client
scripts.check: pnpm generate:openapi && pnpm ts && pnpm lint:fix
scripts.ts: pnpm --filter backend ts && pnpm --filter @cella/cdc ts && pnpm --filter frontend ts
scripts.ts:beta: pnpm --filter backend ts:beta && pnpm --filter frontend ts:beta
scripts.tsperf: pnpm --filter backend tsperf && pnpm --filter frontend tsperf
scripts.tsperf:beta: pnpm --filter backend tsperf:beta && pnpm --filter frontend tsperf:beta
scripts.test:basic: pnpm --filter backend test:basic && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.test:core: pnpm docker:test && pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.test:full: pnpm docker:test && pnpm --filter backend test:full && pnpm --filter frontend test && pnpm --filter @cellajs/sync test
scripts.test:update: pnpm --filter backend exec vitest run -u && pnpm --filter frontend exec vitest run -u
